# Testing ggplot themes  
Theme 1: minimal with dark bg
```{r echo=TRUE}
suppressMessages(library(tidyverse, quietly = TRUE))
source("../../R/theme_blog.R")

theme_set(theme_blog())

mtcars %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = mpg, y = hp)) +
    geom_point(color = theme_colors$fg) +
    ggtitle("A Cool Plot")
```
